transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_139276.2 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000588969.5. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000264657.10. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000678044.1. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.
